## Education/Work Background
I have a B.A. in Translation and Literature from the Federal University of Rio Grande do Sul and an M.A. in American Studies from Johannes Gutenberg University Mainz. I graduated in Translation Studies and Literature from the Federal University of Rio Grande do Sul. I am a doctoral student in Anthropology at the University of Massachusetts Amherst. My current research interests are focused on analyzing the convergence of environmental justice initiatives and clean energy solutions.
